title: Sommerbauer-Into the Barrel Without Bottom(Soviet European Union
description:
For english-only speaking:
This book is in german language. English title would be: Going into the barrel without bottom - Is Austria marching into the collective slavery too? - Backgrounds of EU (1994). Prof. Adolf Sommerbauer reveals the story behind the founding of European Union as an end result of many decades of work of various secret societies. What do socialism and communism really want and how is today's money made and put into circulation? Is it true that the EU is simply the continuaton of Soviet socialist republics? The author tries to sort out the confusion that is constantly produced in the media and schools. The story applies generally to EU and only touches the Austrian situation in a few places. 65 pages, many pictures.
